**AVC:** I feel like the love for Happy Endings extends past Chicago. All of you have gone on to do so well. Do you keep in touch with those guys?
**AP:** Oh, yeah. I talk to Damon [Wayans Jr.] probably four or five times a day. I talk to Casey [Wilson] probably the same amount. I would say I talk to everybody once a week. And the writers, too. So, its a family. And every set I walk on, I hope that its going to feel like Happy Endings, and if it doesnt, I do my hardest to try to make it feel that way.

WRITING.TEXT: Me too, I actually got the subscription exactly one year ago and took only two pills and then started imagining how my heart is racing and I couldnt concentrate anymore so I stopped after reading all those horror stories about taking fin (I didnt even look or saw positive fin stories) but after reading how many people are taking it for over 10 years or longer I started again over a month ago. I feel so much better because I know im doing everything I can against hair loss and the DHT itch is almost gone now which feels so good man even thoug I am shedding-phase right now
